title.rendered: Is COPD curable? If not what can be done if one can’t quit smoking?

content.rendered: While it is not proven that COPD is curable, there are many people who claim to have done so successfully, with diet and lifestyle changes. Dietary supplements too can help in this process. At sepalika.com, we are yet to launch a whole section on COPD; in the meanwhile, we would like to refer you to a fantastic resource on this topic, written by an Richard Firshein, D.O. called “Reversing Asthma: Breathe Easier with This Revolutionary New Program”
